basic.description: This course explores topics such as balance of payments; disequilibrium and adjustment; birth, evolution, and demise of the Bretton Woods System; the managed float; international monetary reform, international factor movements, multinational corporations.
basic.subject: ECO
basic.title: International Finance

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites: ECO 2013 and ECO 2023. Recommended prerequisites: ECO 3203 and ECO 3223.
